title: A Vaccine Passport Is the New Golden Ticket
itunes:title: A Vaccine Passport Is the New Golden Ticket
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, discusses efforts to vaccinate more people from Covid-19. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber shares stories from the “Vaccine Passport” issue of the magazine. Bloomberg News Energy Markets Reporter Robert Tuttle explains the importance of the Suez Canal and how the cargo ship blocking the waterway has snarled international shipping. And we Drive to the Close with Jay Lipman, Co-Founder and President of Ethic.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
